ygData.subject: Re: D.E.D meeting!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Soundwave and the council member arrive at the ship area. The council member shifts towards Soundwave, and whispers. Havotron is crazy, and you may need help.

Soundwave and the council member arrive at the ship area. The council
member shifts towards Soundwave, and whispers. "Havotron is crazy, and
you may need help. Take this pod, it has a unique suprise in it."
